#russia #ru #itp #itpm1 #itp_m1 #plane #collimator #sight #rocket #rockets #rbs82 #rbs

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

Gun and rocket sight for the Russian ITP (M1) fighter.

To aim rockets dive around 20 degrees and follow speed guides. The box in the middle is for 600m above 480kmh. Use the outer guides for 300m. Use the lower sights for under 400kmh, and the upper sights for over 550kmh.

INSTALL by unzipping included UserSkins folder to your War Thunder ...

JAPANESE SIGHTS MEGAPACK
Tested on 1080p only

MOST OF THE SIGHTS HAVE BEEN MADE

This pack only contains sights which I've made so far and has a source.
The pack will be updated whenever I make a new sight for a Japanese tank, or if something needs to be fixed.

Привет ребят!
Оцениваем. Лайкаем. Скачиваем!

Если есть вопросы то пишите в лс дискорда: biba_777

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

Gunsight for the US F-89B and rocket sight for the F-89D. Includes both Fixed and Gyroscopic versions, but I strongly suggest only using the fixed sight for now, as the gyro does not move due to a game bug.

To use the rockets, Dive angle is flexible and will work between 10-35 degrees ...

SEMI HISTORICAL J1 TELESCOPE SIGHT
Tested on 1080p only

Sight is based off of night exercise images.

Vehicles found in this pack:

  • STB-2
  • Type 74 (C)
  • Type 74 (E)
  • Type 74 (F)
  • Type 74 (G)

SOURCE: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EtkM7Nk5uXVM5sspVnTnxeF-cTdfg8ysaxZv1L5S7o0/edit?pli=1&gid=1721666035#gid=1721666035

#draken #j35 #j35a #j35d #j35xs #sweden #plane #collimator #sight #historical #userskin

Historical re-creation of J35 Draken collimator, as requested by a user. simply replaces the Sikte S6/S7 collimator with a more correct looking Beauduin T100 collimator.

Since this is not a collimator made by me and I consider it to be less accurate than my own work, I will not be including it in the Mega Pack.

INSTALL by unzipping included UserSkins folder to your War Thunder root directory and combine with any existing folder.
